name: Carriage Nightmare
description:
DESCRIPTION

Enter in the darkness and survive to your journey with Carriage Nightmare.

This game was made in 2.5 days for a student game jam at Gobelins - L'Ecole de l'Image. We had to create a shoot them up (without science fiction) playable by two players.

Remarks : Some improvements were made after, so 3 days of development at the end were required...

HOW TO PLAY ?

The game is played best with two controllers (but you can also play with a keyboard and a controller).

Press "A" or "L2" (depending your controller) to turn on/off lights.

Press "Space" or "R2" to attack monsters.

TEAM

Perot Alexandre- 3D Artist / Programmer

Marie Gibert - Game Designer / Level Designer / UX

Maximilien Lajony - Manager/ Programmer/ UI

Pierre Billaud - Programmer
